text: is a Japanese multinational corporation that designs and manufactures electronic products. It is headquartered in Sakai-ku, Sakai, Osaka Prefecture. Since 2016 it has been majority owned by the Taiwan-based Foxconn Group. Sharp employs more than 50,000 people worldwide. ==References== Category:1910s establishments in Japan Category:1912 establishments in Asia Category:Technology companies of Japan
title: Sharp Corporation
